Click this text to go back to the login page.
Click this text if you need to register.
Do I qualify for CS Major or Specialist POSt?
Do I qualify for CS Minor POSt?
Do I qualify for Math Major POSt?
Do I qualify for Math Specialist POSt?
Do I qualify for Statistics POSt?
Please select the category you are interested in.

Do you have at least a GPA of 2.5 over the following courses?
 (Basically an average grade of 70% and above in terms of UTSC grading.)
 Introduction to Computer Science II
 Discrete Mathematics
 Linear Algebra I for Mathematical Sciences
 Calculus I for Mathematical Sciences
 Calculus II for Mathematical Sciences
Do you have a minimum grade of B (73-76%) in Introduction to Computer Science II?

Do you have a minimum grade of C- (60-62%) in at least two of these courses?
 Discrete Mathematics
 Linear Algebra I for Mathematical Sciences
 Calculus II for Mathematical Sciences
Have you completed a total of 4 credits? (I.E. eight credited courses)

Out of those 4 credits, have you obtained a credit in each of these?:
 Introduction to Computer Science I
 Introduction to Computer Science II
 Discrete Mathematics
 Linear Algebra I for Mathematical Sciences OR MATA23, the alternative
 AT LEAST ONE of the Calculus Is (Either MATA30, MATA31, MATA32)

Note: Even if you meet these requirements, you will be evaluated based on your grades in
 these courses:
 Introduction to Computer Science II
 Discrete Mathematics
 Linear Algebra I for Mathematical Sciences OR MATA23, the alternative
 
 Basically, if you fulfill the above requirements and maximize your grades in the above
 3 courses, your chances for getting into the CS Minor are better.

Do you have at least a GPA of 2.0 over the following courses?
 (Basically an average grade of 63% and above in terms of UTSC grading.)
 Discrete Mathematics
 Linear Algebra I for Mathematical Sciences
 Calculus I for Mathematical Sciences
 Calculus II for Mathematical Sciences

Do you have a minimum grade of B (73-76%) in at least one of the following?:
 Discrete Mathematics
 Linear Algebra I for Mathematical Sciences
 Calculus II for Mathematical Sciences

Do you have at least a GPA of 2.5 over the following courses?
 (Basically an average grade of 70% and above in terms of UTSC grading.)
 Discrete Mathematics
 Linear Algebra I for Mathematical Sciences
 Calculus I for Mathematical Sciences
 Calculus II for Mathematical Sciences

Do you have a minimum grade of B (73-76%) in at least two of the following?:
 Discrete Mathematics
 Linear Algebra I for Mathematical Sciences
 Calculus II for Mathematical Sciences

Do you have at least a GPA of 2.3 over the following courses?
 (Basically an average grade of 67% and above in terms of UTSC grading.)
 Introduction to Computer Science I OR Introduction to Programming
 
 Linear Algebra I for Mathematical Sciences
 
 Calculus I for Mathematical Sciences OR for Physical Sciences
 
 Calculus II for Mathematical Sciences OR for Physical Sciences
